CustomField.formula:
IF(Maintenance_Due_Days__c > 0 && Has_Monthly_Requirement__c,
IMAGE("/resource/AuditmateCustomer/images/table-status-2.png", "Past Due") + " Past Due",
IMAGE("/resource/AuditmateCustomer/images/table-status-1.png" , "Current") + " Current"
)
CustomField.label: Maintenance Status Image
